categories.name: System Commands
categories.abstract: DevContainer management commands for setup and maintenance.
categories.summary: DevContainer management commands (setup, update, services, help). Essential tools for managing your development environment.

categories.name: Development Tools
categories.abstract: Programming language development environments and tools.
categories.summary: Complete development setups for Python, TypeScript, Go, Rust, .NET, and Bash. Each includes language-specific tooling and VS Code extensions.

categories.name: AI & Machine Learning Tools
categories.abstract: AI and machine learning development tools.
categories.summary: AI and machine learning development tools including Claude Code for AI-assisted coding and other ML utilities.

categories.name: Cloud & Infrastructure Tools
categories.summary: Cloud platform CLIs and SDKs for Azure, AWS, and GCP. Manage cloud resources directly from your development environment.

categories.name: Data & Analytics Tools
categories.abstract: Data analysis, visualization, and engineering tools.
categories.summary: Data analysis, visualization, and data engineering tools including Jupyter, pandas, and database clients. Connect to data platforms.

categories.name: Background Services & Daemons
categories.abstract: Background services and daemons for development.
categories.summary: Background services and daemons including nginx reverse proxy, OTEL collector, and monitoring services. Run services locally.

categories.name: Infrastructure & Configuration
categories.abstract: Infrastructure as Code and configuration management.
categories.summary: Infrastructure as Code, configuration management, and DevOps tools including Kubernetes, Terraform, and Ansible.

categories.name: Contributor Tools
categories.summary: Tools for contributors and maintainers including documentation generators, test runners, and development utilities.
